Sentencas: Ammonia protonic ceramic fuel cells (PCFCs) have the potential to be a highly efficient power source with high energy density.
Titulo: An efficient and durable anode for ammonia protonic ceramic fuel cells

Sentencas: However, the inadequate catalytic activity of the existing anodes for utilization of ammonia greatly limits the performance of PCFCs.
Titulo: An efficient and durable anode for ammonia protonic ceramic fuel cells

Sentencas: Here we report an Fe-modified state-of-the-art Ni cermet anode with greatly enhanced activity and durability toward utilization of ammonia.
Titulo: An efficient and durable anode for ammonia protonic ceramic fuel cells

Sentencas: Cells with an Fe-decorated Ni-BaZr0.1Ce0.7Y0.1Yb0.1O3 (Ni-BZCYYb) anode demonstrate an excellent performance, achieving peak power densities of 0.360, 0.723, 1.257, and 1.609 W cm(-2) at 550, 600, 650, and 700 degrees C, respectively, which reveal the highest performance of solid oxide fuel cells fueled on ammonia.
Titulo: An efficient and durable anode for ammonia protonic ceramic fuel cells

Sentencas: In addition, the cells show an excellent durability when operated at a constant current density of 0.5 A cm(-2) (or a power density of similar to 0.435 W cm(-2)) at 650 degrees C.
Titulo: An efficient and durable anode for ammonia protonic ceramic fuel cells

Sentencas: The superior activity and durability of the Fe-modified Ni/BZCYYb anode are attributed to the alternation of NH3 adsorption strength and N-2 desorption barrier heights, as confirmed by first-principles based mechanistic and microkinetic modeling.
Titulo: An efficient and durable anode for ammonia protonic ceramic fuel cells

Sentencas: Our research provides a valuable guidance for the development of efficient electro-catalysts for ammonia PCFCs.
Titulo: An efficient and durable anode for ammonia protonic ceramic fuel cells
